keyPolicies.policyTitle: STANDING UP FOR PARENTAL CHOICE IN EDUCATION
keyPolicies.policyDescription: I will stand up for Wirral's grammar schools against Labour's plans to abolish them. I will always defend parents' right to choose the best type of education for their children.
The government has announced £33.9 billion for the NHS. I will fight to ensure local hospitals such as Clatterbridge see their fair share of this investment.
Thanks to Wirral Labour, our precious Green Belt is under threat of development. That's why I will demand a properly written local plan.

issues.education: I will stand up for Wirral's grammar schools against Labour's plans to abolish them. I will always defend parents' right to choose the best type of education for their children.
